title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Tender beef strips cooked with colorful vegetables in a savory soy-based sauce.
instructions: Slice the vegetables and beef into thin strips.
Heat oil in a pan or wok.
Stir fry the beef until browned.
Add vegetables and cook until slightly tender.
Stir in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Mix well, simmer for 2 minutes, and serve hot.
